name: Igor M. Moraes
content: Igor Monteiro Moraes Igor Monteiro Moraes Laboratório MídiaCom Instituto de Computação Universidade Federal Fluminense Av. Gal. Milton Tavares de Souza s/n, Prédio do IC, Sala 551, São Domingos, Niterói, RJ, Brazil 24210-346 Email: igor /*at*/ ic . uff . br Phone: +55 21 2629-5665 Public key Short Biography Igor Monteiro Moraes is currently an Associate Professor in the Instituto de Computação (IC) at Universidade Federal Fluminense (UFF). Igor received the cum laude Electronic Engineer degree in 2003 and the M.Sc. and the D.Sc. degrees in electrical engineering from Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ) in 2006 and 2009, respectively. He is/was involved in research projects on service differentiation, optical networks, digital television, denial of service, peer-to-peer systems, and Internet of the Future. His major research interests are in peer-to-peer video streaming systems, optical networks, wireless networks, and network security.
